casebody.data:
Roger D. PETERS and Carrie A. Peters, Claimants and Appellants,
v.
UNITED STATES of America (BUREAU OF RECLAMATION), Objector and Appellee. DA 18-0142 Supreme Court of Montana. Submitted on Briefs: November 14, 2018
Decided: January 8, 2019

Affirmed in part. Reversed in part. Remanded.
